title: go1.1RC2: compiling error in linux/amd64
body:
by **raul.san@sent.com**: 
Tested in Ubuntu 12.04.2 LTS

The compilation test in 1.1rc2 fails in amd64/linux (in 386/linux is ok):

# ../test/bench/go1
ok  	_/usr/local/go/test/bench/go1	2.990s

# ../test
runoutput            rotate0.go          : incorrect output
go build command-line-arguments: signal: killed

runoutput            rotate1.go          : incorrect output
go build command-line-arguments: signal: killed

runoutput            rotate2.go          : incorrect output
go build command-line-arguments: signal: killed

signal: killed
